member.name: M:Sudoku.IO.GridLibrary.FilterAsync(System.Func{Sudoku.Concepts.Grid,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Boolean},System.Action,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.returns: An instance that iterates on filtered instances.

member.summary: Indicates the puzzle will be never ignored.

member.summary: Indicates the puzzle will be ignored when it is not unique.
